snippet: The United States urged Myanmar to investigate reports that security forces and Buddhist mobs attacked members of the Rohingya Muslim minority, killing as many as 60 people.
lead_paragraph: The United States urged Myanmar to investigate reports that security forces and Buddhist mobs attacked members of the Rohingya Muslim minority, killing as many as 60 people.

headline.main: Myanmar: Signs of Unrest Raise Alarms
headline.print_headline: Myanmar: Signs of Unrest Raise Alarms
